content:
@Bryn Rhodes looking at FHIRPath - the root title is "FHIRPath Normative Ballot" - I think it's the STU.
I wonder whether we should also mention the package id in the footer. I think no, because no one has any reason to actually use the fhirpath package? Unless they use the grammar?
Yes, missed that, fixed now. I also updated the ballot status bar, and added one to the 2019May. I agree, no on the package id in the footer, not likely to ever be used.
